dict.acceptation: 禁止，下令禁止；剥夺权利；[古]诅咒；
禁止，禁令；谴责；诅咒，诅骂；革出教门；

sent.orig: BAN logic was used to construct an ideal model of the well known Needham Schroeder protocol.
sent.trans: 采用BAN逻辑对著名的Needham Schroeder(NS)协议建立理想化协议模型 ，利用协议的初始假设和BAN逻辑的公设分析NS协议的安全性 。

sent.orig: While server admins may choose to ban specific players, server admins cannot VAC ban players.
sent.trans: 服务器的管理员可以禁止某些玩家登入其服务器，但不能设置VAC禁用玩家。

sent.orig: India is expected to end export ban, as well as its ban on rice-futures trading.
sent.trans: 预计印度将取消出口禁令和禁止大米期货交易的规定。

sent.orig: Ban ban is supported by other activity rooms, nap rooms, bathrooms, games area.
sent.trans: 班班有配套的活动室、午睡室、盥洗室、游戏区等。

sent.orig: The products are widely used in plywood, particleboard, and in the Midu Ban Tiemian Ban.
sent.trans: 该产品广泛应用于胶合板、刨花板、中密度板和贴面板。
